preqs: Must be enrolled in: F3701 Bachelor of Fine Art (Honours)

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {F3701%}
Must be enrolled in course version {F3701%}

unitName: Major project - Art history and theory honours
description: This unit is the second part of a major art history and theory research project; following AHT4111 Project studies (Art history and theory honours), it provides an opportunity to extend research and complete the work required for the written thesis. The thesis should be on a topic chosen by the student and approved by the department by at the time of application. The thesis will be written under supervision, and students will be expected to meet regularly with their supervisors. The thesis must be submitted in two typed copies, suitably bound, at the end of the Second Semester.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
